title: Invited Speaker - Php is Not Dead - Laravel is Proof
company: Animo Labs HQ - De La Salle University Manila
bullets: Conducted a workshop that helped students and developers overcome barriers to learning PHP frameworks while debunking common myths about PHP

title: Business Value Class
bullets: A workshop inspired by the Business Value Game, designed to teach participants how to prioritize features, evaluate trade-offs, and make value-driven decisions that align with business goals

title: Agile 101 Class
bullets: An introductory workshop that teaches the fundamentals of Agile principles, frameworks, and team practices, helping participants understand how to deliver value through iterative and collaborative development
